content: Select all visible folders and files

comment.text: The translation key "HotkeysSelectAll" is used to display a tooltip or label indicating that pressing the Ctrl + A hotkey will select all visible folders and files in a UI element, such as a HotkeysPanel component. This message appears on a button within a panel.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The German translation uses the subjunctive mood incorrectly. The action of selecting should be in the imperative mood.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Alle sichtbaren Ordner und Dateien auswählen.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'folders and files' is a common pairing. While 'պանակները և ֆայլերը' is technically correct, 'ֆայլերը' might be better translated as 'ֆայլայինները' to match the formality and common usage within a software context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ընտրել բոլոր տեսանելի պանակները և ֆայլայինները

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '표시되는 모든 폴더 및 파일 선택' while technically correct, doesn't quite capture the nuance of 'Select all visible folders and files'. A more natural Korean phrasing might better convey the intent. '보이는 모든 폴더와 파일을 모두 선택하세요' is more conversational and aligns better with the original English.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 보이는 모든 폴더와 파일을 모두 선택하세요

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "ເລືອກໂຟເດີ ແລະໄຟລ໌ທັງໝົດທີ່ເຫັນ" directly translates to 'Select folders and files all that see'. It lacks the nuance of 'visible' and implies selecting everything that the user sees, which might not be what's intended.  It should convey the meaning of 'visible' or 'currently displayed'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເລືອກໂຟເດີ ແລະໄຟລ໌ທັງໝົດທີ່ສະແດງອອກ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'පෙනෙන සියළුම බහාලුම් හා ගොනු තෝරන්න' is a literal translation but sounds slightly unnatural in Sinhala. A more natural phrasing would emphasize selecting all visible items.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: සියළු පෙනෙන ෆෝල්ඩර් හා ගොනු තෝරන්න

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'ෆෝල්ඩර්' (folder) is acceptable due to English loanwords, using a more Sinhala equivalent might be preferable for broader accessibility. However, this is a judgement call based on the intended audience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: සියළු පෙනෙන තොග හා ගොනු තෝරන්න

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Premakni vse vidne mape in datoteke' translates to 'Move all visible folders and files,' which doesn't match the intended meaning of 'Select all visible folders and files.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Izberi vse vidne mape in datoteke

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Tüm görünür klasörleri ve dosyaları seç' while generally correct, could be slightly improved to better reflect the English 'Select all visible folders and files'. A more natural phrasing in Turkish would emphasize 'selection' more directly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tüm görünür klasör ve dosyaları seçin

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Chọn tất cả các thư mục và tập tin có thể nhìn thấy' is a literal translation but doesn't quite convey the intended meaning of 'visible' in the context of a hotkey panel. It implies that only folders and files that are literally visible on screen are selected, which might not be the case. It's better to imply that all currently selected or active folders and files are included.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Chọn tất cả các thư mục và tập tin đang được chọn

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'tập tin' is a bit formal for a hotkey panel. A more conversational term would be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Chọn tất cả các thư mục và file đang được chọn
